title: Arthur Peat
text: William Arthur Peat (1 September 1940 – 16 July 2012) was an English professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> right half who made over 400 appearances in <a href="the%20Football%20League">the Football League</a> for <a href="Southport%20F.C.">Southport</a>. He is Southport's record appearance-maker with 435 and also <a href="Captain%20%28association%20football%29">captained</a> and managed the club.
